artifacts.title: Artifact information
artifacts.description: URL of Ivy file describing the artifacts produced by this Multiproduct. This field is only populated in the build spec.

repo_name.title: Artifact repository
repo_name.description: Artifactory repository to which the Multiproduct's artifacts will be published

databases.title: Databases to reinit
databases.description: Databases to reinit using mint database. This field is only populated in the build spec.

images.title: Image artifacts
images.description: Image style artifacts to be published via image-tool. This field is only populated in the build spec.

repository_overrides.title: Repository overrides
repository_overrides.description: Specify Artifactory repositories for specific build directories. This overrides the repository specified by repo_name.
